Package com.roman.sapun.java.socialmedia.service

Interface CommentService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CommentServiceImpl
public interface CommentService

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ResponseCommentDTO
    createComment(RequestCommentDTO requestCommentDTO, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
    creates comment, adds a creation time to it and bonds it to author that created comment.

    deleteComment(String identifier, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)

  • Method Details

    • createComment

      ResponseCommentDTO createComment(RequestCommentDTO requestCommentDTO, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)

      creates comment, adds a creation time to it and bonds it to author that created comment.

      Parameters:
      requestCommentDTO - includes essential parts of comment as title and description for creating comment.
      authentication - for searching currently logged-in user.
      Returns:
      comment DTO that includes author image and comment details.

    • deleteComment

      ResponseCommentDTO deleteComment(String identifier, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication) throws CommentNotFoundException

      Deletes comment based on comment identifier.

      Parameters:
      identifier - comment's generated unique identifier.
      authentication - for searching currently logged-in user.
      Returns:
      comment DTO that includes author image and comment details.
      Throws:
      CommentNotFoundException - if comment cannot be found or if author and user doesn't match.

    • getCommentsByPostIdentifier

      Map<String,Object> getCommentsByPostIdentifier(String identifier, int pageNumber)

      Gets comments based on post identifier and page that we want to return.

      Parameters:
      identifier - comment's generated unique identifier.
      pageNumber - page that we want to return.
      Returns:
      map that includes 50 comments, overall number of comments, current comment page and overall number of pages.

    • updateCommentById

      ResponseCommentDTO updateCommentById(RequestCommentDTO requestCommentDTO, String identifier, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication) throws CommentNotFoundException

      Updates comment by identifier.

      Parameters:
      requestCommentDTO - includes updated data, such as title and description.
      identifier - comment's generated unique identifier.
      authentication - authentication for searching currently logged-in user.
      Returns:
      comment DTO that includes author image and updated comment details.
      Throws:
      CommentNotFoundException - if comment cannot be found or if author and user doesn't match.
